an5.104:4.1: * “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an5.104:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito;
an5.104:5.3: yācitova bahulaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito;
an5.104:5.4: yācitova bahulaṃ senāsanaṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito;
an5.104:5.5: yācitova bahulaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito.
an5.104:5.6: Yehi kho pana sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ viharati, tyassa manāpeneva bahulaṃ kāyakammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an5.104:5.7: manāpeneva bahulaṃ vacīkammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an5.104:5.8: manāpeneva bahulaṃ manokammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an5.104:5.10: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā, tānissa na bahudeva uppajjanti.
an5.104:5.11: Appābādho hoti, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.104:5.12: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an5.104:6.1: Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5.104:6.2: ‘samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo’ti, mameva taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5.104:6.4: Ahañhi, bhikkhave, yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito;
an5.104:6.5: yācitova bahulaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito;
an5.104:6.6: yācitova bahulaṃ senāsanaṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito;
an5.104:6.7: yācitova bahulaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito.
an5.104:6.8: Yehi kho pana bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharāmi, te maṃ manāpeneva bahulaṃ kāyakammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an5.104:6.9: manāpeneva bahulaṃ vacīkammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an5.104:6.10: manāpeneva bahulaṃ manokammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an5.104:6.13: pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā—
an5.104:6.15: Appābādhohamasmi, catunnaṃ kho panasmi jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānaṃ khayā … pe … sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmi.
an5.104:7.1: Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5.104:7.2: ‘samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo’ti, mameva taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
